13.name: wordpress/member-approval
13.description:
Works best with edited Emails through the s2Member Framework.

Allow your Users to sign up, and not be able to log in until they have been Approved by an Administrator through the Dashboard. Meant to be simple to get started with.

You can also deactivate current Users, and prevent them from logging in as well right through the User Edit Panel, and send Notification Emails to both yourself and the User that registers about your Approval Process!
